install.description: FlippingBook Gallery Plugin is a extension that allows you to publish book inside a content item. Just include {flippingbook_book X}, where X - book ID. The book ID value you can find in Book Manager (Components - FlippingBook - Manage Books). The plugin allows to publish only one book on a webpage.
